content: **drops crochet jacket in paris and brushed alpaca silk** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ size xs-s m l xl xxl finished measurements bust 76-86-96-106-114-126 cm / 30 -34 -37 3/4 -41 3/4 -45 -49½ full length 56-58-60-62-64-66 cm / 22 -22¾ -23 5/8 -24 3/8 -25¼ -26 materials drops paris from garnstudio 550-600-650-750-800-900 g color no 25 moss green and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio 50 g colour no 14 light grey green for borders and use drops safran from garnstudio remnants of colors used for bikini top drops crochet hook size 5 mm / h/8 drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c for buttons 3 buttons diam 2 cm / 3/4 for crochet covers
